scripts.ci: npm ci && lerna exec --ignore=@template/* --concurrency 2 --stream -- npm ci
scripts.ncu: ncu --dep prod,dev -u && lerna exec --concurrency 2 --stream -- ncu --dep prod,dev -u -x webpack
scripts.pack: lerna exec --ignore=@template/* --concurrency 2 --stream -- npm install && lerna exec --ignore=@template/* --concurrency 2 --stream -- npm pack
scripts.outdated: (npm outdated || true) && lerna exec --concurrency 2 --stream -- npm outdated
scripts.remove: lerna exec --concurrency 2 --stream -- rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json *.log *.tgz && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json *.log  *.tgz
scripts.reinstall: npm run remove && npm run update
scripts.update: npm install && lerna exec --ignore=@template/* --concurrency 2 --stream -- npm install
